Name: BAE Systems
Description: BAE Systems is a weapons manufacturer based in the UK.
Reason: BAE Systems supplies many military hardware and software items to the Israeli Air Force. Including parts of the F-35 fighter jet and flares used in many of the aircraft.
Alternatives: Work for an engineering company that has no involvement in producing weapons used in israel.

Name: Boeing
Description: Boeing is responsible for military and aerospace products and services.
Reason: Provides Israel with Hellfire missiles, F-15 Eagle fighter jets, MK84 2000-lb bombs and Apache helicopters.
Alternatives: Work for an engineering firm which doesn't manufacture weapons used by israel.

Name: Caterpillar
Description: Heavy machinery manufacturer, which also manufactures footwear and clothing.
Reason: Caterpillar bulldozers have been used in the demolition of Palestinian homes. The D9 bulldozer was specifically designed for the IDF.
How to Boycott: Don't buy Caterpillar clothes or machinery. Don't sell Caterpillar clothes or machinery. Don't work for Caterpillar.

Name: Elbit Systems
Description: Weapons manufacturer based in Haifa, Israel.
Reason: Builds drones which are used in the killing of innoncent Palestinians.
How to Boycott: Don't work for Elbit Systems. You probably can't buy killer drones from them anyway.
Alternatives: Work for an engineering company which doesn't produce weapons for israel.

Name: Hyundai
Description: Korean car manufacturer, which also manufactures heavy machinery.
Reason: Hyundai heavy machinery has been used in the demolition of Palestinian neighbourhoods in Jerusalem, benefiting them commercially from the Israeli occupation.
How to Boycott: Don't buy Hyundai cars or machinery. Don't sell Hyundai cars or machinery. Don't work for Hyundai.

Name: Lockheed Martin
Description: American weapons manufacturer, largest in the world.
Reason: Lockheed Martin plays a significant role in the military ability of the State of Israel. They supply the IDF with F-16 fighter jets, F-35 fighter jets, CH-53K helicopters and other military hardware and software.

Name: MBDA
Description: MBDA is a weapons manufacturer with operations in the UK.
Reason: Israel Aerospace Industries (IAI) is working with the German arm of MBDA and signed a cooperation agreement for the production, integration, sales, and marketing of IAI's loitering ammunition systems in Germany
Alternatives: Work for an engineering company which does not make or sell weapons for israel.

Name: Motorola
Description: Communications and electronics manufacturer and operator.
Reason: The IDF uses motorola as a main supplier for its communication equipment which enables them to effectively control the occupied Palestinians. They also manufacture the bomb fuses used in IDF bombs.
How to Boycott: Don't buy Motorola devices. Don't sell Motorola devices. Don't work for Motorola.

Name: Raytheon
Description: RTX manufactures aircraft engines, avionics, aerostructures, cybersecurity solutions, guided missiles, air defense systems, satellites, and drones used in warefare around the world.
Reason: Supplies the IDF with the Iron Dome system. Enabling Israel to occupy Palestine with impunity and without fear of resistance.

Name: SodaStream
Reason: SodaStream is an Israeli company which manufactured its products in Occupied Palestine. Now owned by Pepsico after a $3.2b acquisition. It since moved its factory from the West Bank to main Israel, however is still subject to boycott for its firing of 60 Palestinian workers and dark history.
How to Boycott: Dont buy Sodastream devices. Don't sell Sodastream devices.
Alternatives: Supermarket own brand products, eg. Aldi, Asda, Lidl. Saka water (from Turkiye). Barr Drinks (owner of Irn Bru).

Name: Volvo Heavy Machinery
Reason: Volvo heavy machinery has been used in the demolition of Palestinian neighbourhoods in Occupied Palestine, benefiting them commercially from the Israeli occupation. They issued a statement distancing themselves and rejecting responsibility for its sales networks decisions, however, it is still complicit unless it ends its relationship with the companies who sell equipment to the IDF, for example Mayers Cars and Trucks in Ashdod.
How to Boycott: Don't buy Volvo machinery. Don't sell Volvo machinery. Don't work for Volvo heavy machinery.
